# Carlos Tarrats - Software & Visual Designer

## About
Carlos Tarrats is a Software & Visual Designer based in Los Angeles, CA. He specializes in simplifying complex systems, 0-1 product development, and enterprise systems design.

## Experience
Most recently spent three years with the Department of Defense's Chief Digital and AI Office (Defense Digital Service), leading design for modernization initiatives in high-security environments. Earlier work spans startups and large corporations, focused on projects combining technical challenge with purposeful impact.

## Skills
- Product Design
- Visual Design
- 0-1 Product Development
- Enterprise Systems
- Digital Transformation
- AI-assisted Prototyping

## Projects

### AdaptiveShop
A modern ecommerce platform with built-in AI and modular features. Lets independent sellers launch stores quickly with real-time editing, smart links, analytics, and print-on-demand integrations.
URL: https://carlostarrats.github.io/projects/adaptiveshop.html

### Control
A text-only open-source on-device LLM app for iOS. Runs Gemma3, Llama3.2, SmolLM2, and Qwen3 entirely on-device with no accounts, no data collection, and no network dependency.
URL: https://carlostarrats.github.io/projects/control.html

### Defense Digital Service
Digital transformation of the Defense Department, integrating AI, data, cyber, and IT. Work details at https://defensedigitalservice-org.github.io/dds-mil/

### Eloquii
Platform redesign improving the online shopping experience for plus-size fashion customers. Led design of a modular, scalable system with reusable components and mobile parity.
URL: https://carlostarrats.github.io/projects/eloquii.html

## Contact
